CSS.question: Which property is used to change the text color in CSS?

Which CSS property is used to control the size of an element's border?
What is the purpose of the 'padding' property in CSS?
choices: To control the space between an element's border and its content
To set the width of an element
To control the space between an element's margin and its content
CSS.answer: To control the space between an element's border and its content

JavaScript.question:
What is the output of the following JavaScript code?

console.log(2 + '2');
Which keyword is used to declare a variable in JavaScript?
What is the correct way to check if a variable is an array in JavaScript?
What is the purpose of the 'this' keyword in JavaScript?
choices: To refer to the current function
To refer to the global object
To refer to the parent object
To refer to the current object
JavaScript.answer: To refer to the current object

JavaScript.question:
What is the output of the following JavaScript code?

console.log(3 === '3');

What is the purpose of the 'return' statement in a JavaScript function?
choices: To specify the function's return value
To break out of a loop
JavaScript.answer: To specify the function's return value
